assumptions_register.statement: Evidence paths referenced in this bundle are target intents and may not yet be populated.
Payment rail adapters can emit replay-safe receipts with deterministic ids.
External replication partners will provide signed evidence compatible with APM2 evidence contracts.

business_model.value_hypothesis: Verification-grade autonomy infrastructure commands a trust premium and compounds cost/performance advantages through recursive verifier improvement.

moat_hypotheses.statement: Verifier compounding reduces authoritative transition cost faster than competitors.
Containment trust premium sustains enterprise retention.
Principal-bound finance autonomy lowers operating friction while preserving fraud containment.

business_claim_contracts.statement: Enterprise cells paid and retention reach product-line A targets.
Prosumer private cluster adoption reaches scale with preserved privacy.
Verification cost share remains bounded while quality does not regress.
Security-adjusted gross margin remains above floor with zero rigor regressions.
All autonomous financial actions execute under principal-bound delegated authority with fail-closed policy and reconciliation guarantees.
Maintain employee_count == 0 while automating LLC formation and lifecycle management under principal-bound delegated control.
Build commercially durable revenue from governed autonomy stack.

segments.name: Regulated Enterprise Platform Teams
pain_points: unverifiable AI outputs in compliance-critical workflows

segments.description: Regulated enterprises requiring verifiable autonomous operations.
Individual and small-team private clusters with strict confidentiality controls.

operating_model.employment_constraint: employee_count == 0 (no W-2 employees); operations run through principal-bound agent lanes and contractor channels.
operating_model.promotion_rule: Tier2+ promotion requires signed evidence, policy freshness pass, stop-state pass, and quorum-valid authority graph.

risk_register.fail_closed_rule: deny promotion until quorum divergence zeroed with signed remediation receipt
deny terminal impact promotion until replication latency returns below threshold
deny all autonomous financial actions until reconciliation and compensation receipts are complete
deny transition and require authority graph repair receipt
deny expansion promotions until capacity relief passes gate
deny new phase admission until oracle backlog normalized
deny transition and freeze affected capability scope
deny phase promotion and route to legal hard-constraint escalation lane
deny novelty promotion and require stronger prior-art replay evidence
deny promotion and deny financial execution when escape rate is non-zero
deny authoritative transition and deny finance settlement
deny any delegated action when revocation uncertainty exists
deny promotion to next milestone until queue is within budget
deny promotion and lock deployment scope to prior valid boundary
deny milestone promotion and reallocate compute to verification
deny promotion and deny new payroll obligations when employee_count deviates from zero

scenario_matrix.falsification_trigger: MET-ARR-USD below 15000000 or MET-FIN-STP-RATIO below 0.93 or MET-EMPLOYEE-COUNT != 0
